basics.name: Yunus SARIBULUT
basics.label: Next.js & React Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Next.js developer with expertise in building modern, scalable web applications. Specialized in full-stack development using Next.js, React, and TypeScript, with strong backend integration capabilities using Node.js and various databases. I have successfully delivered multiple production-ready applications with focus on performance optimization, SEO, and user experience. My experience spans from startup environments to enterprise-level projects, consistently delivering high-quality, maintainable code that drives business growth.

work.summary: Led the development of a cloud-based AI recruitment platform using Next.js and modern web technologies.
highlights: Developed the complete candidate web application using Next.js 13+ with Pages Router
Implemented server-side rendering and static generation for optimal performance and SEO
Built responsive UI components using React, Material UI, and custom CSS
Integrated Prisma ORM for efficient database operations with PostgreSQL
Developed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services
Implemented authentication, profile management, and resume management systems
Responsible for project architecture, development, and team management

work.summary: EYS is an international helping organization that provides services to people in need. This is a backoffice application for organization to manage their employees across the world.
highlights: Developed the backoffice using Next.js 15 with App Router
Used Minimals UI, Material UI, NextAuth, Prisma, PostgreSQL
Deployed using Docker, Github Actions to an Ubuntu Server
Implemented authentication, profile management, role and permission management
Implemented excel import and export features into PostgreSQL

work.summary: Developed a comprehensive job marketplace platform connecting job seekers and employers in the service sector.
highlights: Built the entire backoffice and admin panel using Next.js with server-side rendering capabilities
Implemented dynamic routing and optimized page loading for better user experience
Developed job posting interface, resume management system, and payment integration
Created responsive design ensuring compatibility across all devices
Integrated payment providers (Stripe, PayPal) with Next.js API routes
Implemented real-time features for job notifications and messaging
Optimized SEO with Next.js built-in features and structured data

work.summary: Otelz is an online travel agency established in Turkey in 2014.
highlights: Developed the web app using Next.js
Optimized SEO with Next.js built-in features and structured data
Implemented dynamic routing and optimized page loading for better user experience
Created responsive design ensuring compatibility across all devices
Developed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services

work.summary: Leading provider of high-quality car care chemicals and related solutions.
highlights: Developed the complete web application from ground up using Next.js v9 with Pages router
Built e-commerce platform with product catalog and shopping cart
Integrated Firebase for push notification management
Implemented React Native Web for cross-platform compatibility
Created responsive design for optimal user experience across devices
